questions.questionTitle: Where most likely are the speakers?
What does Mr. Hernandez ask about?
anwers: The location of a hotel room

script:
� Excuse me. Is this the registration table for the Future Automobile Convention?
� Yes sir. What's your name please? I'll find your information package and a name tag.
� My name's Paul Hernandez. Also, would you happen to know when the discussion on plug-in electric cars will take place?
� Let's see. That's scheduled for 3 p.m. in Building A. Room 322.
